QuestData.Title: Waterlogged Tome
QuestData.Description: In spite of its magical nature, the book has been damaged by water.$B$BThe head of the curators in Dalaran is renowned for his abilities. Perhaps he can restore it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Waterlogged Tome to Robert Newhearth in Dalaran.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Waterlogged Tome to Robert Newhearth in Dalaran.
